jobFunction: Sales, Health Care Provider, and Science
industry: Staffing and Recruiting and Medical Equipment Manufacturing
description:
Med Device/Healthcare company looking for a med device sales rep in ORANGE COUNTY, CA

IF you're interested/qualified, please send your resume DAVID@DAVIDBAGGA.COM - thx!

**SALARY - $100-125K Base plus commission and car allowance OTE first year is $180-200K with room for growth **



**Territory is OC, LONG BEACH, and small part of INLAND EMPIRE**


**candidates must live in greater OC for this position **


**Looking for candidates that have around 3-10 years or more of hospital medical device sales experience running your own territory and your resume must have numbers, rankings, awards, etc. **


**NO JOB HOPPERS PLEASE**


bachelors degree required for this position.
